about: Hello my name is Jason September ,I am 25 years old. I like to be on the road and not at home ,I like going to new places and meeting new people. I also like discovering new restaurants and trying out their foods. I like to work out and keep myself fit whenever I am not too lazy. I love watching anime and I don't think that will stop anytime soon.

I never knew much about computers on school ,only found my fascination for it late in my life but not too late to persue a career in the tech industry.I have done coding online through CodeSpace and that's where I started as an Aspiring Developer .I am stil very inexperienced when it comes to coding but more than willing to learn so that I can better myself ,my knowledge and my understanding of how code works.

workExperience.description: I worked as a packer in the fruit and veg isle.
Worked as a male nurse at an Old Age Home called helpende hande located in stikland.
Worked as cashier and all arounder
Started as a factory worker and worked myself up into our branch's colour lab and worked as a colour matcher for 2 years

reviews.name: Taryn-lee
reviews.title: Aspiring Developer
reviews.quotes: Jason is very kind-hearted and compassionate,He enjoy what he does and that speaks wonders. He never backs down from hardships or struggles that's a quality that I admire. Jason takes pride in his work and it truly shows

reviews.name: Nathalie
reviews.title: Aspiring Developer
reviews.quotes: Jason is a very soft-spoken individual and always helps where he can. He is very humble and always hope for the best. He is very knowledgeable and is quite generous with bestowing that with others.

reviews.name: Matthew
reviews.title: Aspiring Developer
reviews.quotes: Jason September is an outstanding individual, whether it be his work or him as a person . Always pleasant to work with, always promotes positivity, great communicative skills and has unmatched enthusiasm and determination. He is the ideal work colleague but mainly the the best companion and friend.

reviews.name: Darren
reviews.title: Aspiring Developer
reviews.quotes: Jason September is a naturally skilled developer who has a bright future in this industry. His hard work and his willingness to assist others already makes him such a talented developer. Once you see his projects or designs, its only then that you realize what an incredibly high work ethic Jason has.

reviews.name: Brandon
reviews.title: Aspiring Developer
reviews.quotes: Jason is an exceptional student who succeeds at anything  what he puts his mind to, his approach to complex logic and his team spirit is unique and whereas he will make him become one of the most important assets to the work place and to people he collaborates with together with this he is also hardworking and never gives up on a challenge with this is his hunger and thirst for knowledge is unquestionably what makes him the best at what he does, I am truly proud I met him along the way in my life he is truly one of the best people I have worked with.

reviews.name: Matthew Dean
reviews.title: Lecturer
reviews.quotes: Jason is very outstanding and creative individual,who struggles at first but always rises to the occation.He shows good promise in his work and work well with groups and always has a positive attitude.
